sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not failor overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: MoH Rwanda
MoH Rwanda
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE `moh_bill_payment` MODIFY `date_received` datetime DEFAULT NULL;

diff.author: Rwanda EMR
Rwanda EMR
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE moh_bill_admission ADD disease_type varchar(100) DEFAULT " ";

diff.author: Rwanda EMR
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE moh_bill_beneficiary ADD company varchar(100) DEFAULT " ";

diff.author: Rwanda EMR
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE moh_bill_global_bill ADD insurance_id int(11);

diff.author: Rwanda EMR
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE moh_bill_patient_service_bill ADD drug_frequency varchar(50) DEFAULT " ";

diff.author: Rwanda EMR
Rwanda EMR
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE moh_bill_facility_service_price ADD hide_item TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0;

diff.author: Rwanda EMR
